settings.title: Small Batch Pottery
settings.text:
Handcrafted in Lake Stevens, WA
Each piece is hand-thrown and fired with care in monthly kiln loads

settings.title: Fresh from the Kiln
settings.text: December's kiln load is here! 58 unique pieces including mugs, bowls, and decorative pieces. Each piece is one-of-a-kind and ready to ship.

settings.title: Handcrafted in Small Batches
settings.text: Each piece is individually thrown on the pottery wheel in my Lake Stevens studio. I produce 50-70 pieces per month, firing my kiln 1-2 times monthly. This small-batch approach ensures quality and allows me to give each piece individual attention.

settings.title: Small Batch Production
settings.text: Only 50-70 pieces per month means each item gets individual attention from start to finish.

settings.title: Food Safe & Durable
settings.text: All pieces are fired to stoneware temperatures and safe for dishwasher, microwave, and oven use.

settings.title: Custom Orders Welcome
settings.text: Have something specific in mind? I love creating custom pieces designed just for you.

settings.title: Get Kiln Load Updates
settings.text: Be the first to know when new pieces come out of the kiln. Monthly emails with photos of the latest batch and early access to new pieces.
